org.midica.file

Class ConfirmDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midica.file.ConfirmDialog

  • public class ConfirmDialog
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides a confirm dialog implementing the same look and feel as the other components.

    It uses JOptionPane to create the dialog.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller

    • Method Detail

      • confirm

        public static int confirm(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.String title)

        Creates a new confirm dialog with a YES button and a NO button.

        Returns a result value, according to the user’s action:

        • If the YES button was pressed, returns JOptionPane.YES_OPTION.
        • If the NO button was pressed, returns JOptionPane.NO_OPTION.
        • If no button was pressed (dialog closed by pressing ESC or otherwise), returns JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent frame
        message - the question to be asked
        title - the window title
        Returns:
        a value according to the clicked button, like described above.

      • closeDialog

        private static void closeDialog(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)

        Close the dialog after a button has been pressed.

        Parameters:
        e - action event created by pressing the button
